ref segment: Porque os considero un amigo.
src segment: Because I think of you as a friend.

ref segment: ¿No os prometí que os traería al paraíso?
src segment: Did I not promise I'd bring you to paradise?

ref segment: Al decir amor sólo quería decir que os amo, nada más.
src segment: I said love 'cause I meant to say I love you, that's all.

ref segment: Cada uno de vosotros... no solo los jefes de departamento, sino cada uno de vosotros... teneis que denunciar cualquier comportamiento sospechoso... que aprecieis en vuestros companeros. Cualquier suceso extrano... o cualquier cosa que os llame la atencion.
src segment: Each of you, not only section heads, but each and every one of you, has simply got to report oddities of behaviour among your colleagues, strange events or anything else that strikes you as out of the ordinary.

ref segment: Esa es la peor parte, os he decepcionado.
src segment: That's the worst part of it. I let you down.

ref segment: Que el Senor os bendiga y os guarde... y que haga resplandecer Su rostro en vuestros corazones...
src segment: The Lord bless you and keep you, the Lord make his face to shine upon you and be gracious unto you.

ref segment: Llevamos mucho tiempo sin hablarnos, pero yo os amo, no culpo...
src segment: We didn't speak with one another for too long, Sara. And yet, I loved you all. I'm not guilty...

ref segment: Llevad el trigo al hombre que os he dicho...
src segment: Take the wheat to the man I told you.

ref segment: No sé quién os traicionó ni por qué.
src segment: I do not know who betrayed you or why.

ref segment: El príncipe os ha invitado a cenar.
src segment: Prince invited you to dinner.

ref segment: Yo os mate, Dios...
src segment: I kill you, God...

ref segment: Siento lo del globo, pero no penséis que os hemos olvidado.
src segment: Sorry about the balloon, chaps, but don't think we've forgotten you.

ref segment: No os quiero alarmar, pero están ocurriendo cosas bastante feas aquí.
src segment: I don't wish to alarm you, but there's some pretty weird things going on out here.

ref segment: ¿ Qué os habia dicho?
src segment: - See, what did I tell you?

ref segment: ¿Quién os encargó buscarme?
src segment: Who put you up to soliciting me?

ref segment: ¿Para que os llevara a una matanza?
src segment: So that Kathryn can lead you to a slaughter?

ref segment: No me habréis metido en este lío para que os saque de él.
src segment: You haven't manoeuvred me into this mess just so I can get you out of it.

ref segment: Si tratáis de seguirnos, os mataré.
src segment: If you attempt to follow us, I will kill you.

ref segment: Yo os he creado.
src segment: I created you!

ref segment: He hablado con Mr. Hong... Le he pedido que os lleve al templo de Shaolin.
src segment: I've spoken to Mr. Hong... and asked him to take you to Shaolin Temple

ref segment: He tenido una idea que tal vez os interese, ¿de acuerdo?
src segment: I had an idea that might be of interest to you, OK?

ref segment: Que recojáis todo, dejéis vuestras casas... y vayáis a otra isla, donde os darán trabajo.
src segment: They want all of you to pack your possessions, leave your homes, and go to another island.

ref segment: Ya os lo he dicho, nada de fotos.
src segment: Like I told you before, man... no pictures!

ref segment: Basta. ¿Qué os he dicho?
src segment: Enough! What'd I tell you before?

ref segment: El mundo os ha dado por el culo, y nada os importa una mierda.
src segment: The world has fucked you over, so now you don't give a shit.

ref segment: Ya saldré, y en cuanto salga, os iré a buscar.
src segment: I will go out and as I come out, I'll go get you.

ref segment: Tú no temas, hablaremos con tu madre y le diremos que esa francesa os ha engañado.
src segment: Have no fear, we'll talk to your mother and tell her of that French woman that has deceived you.

ref segment: Si os abandono señora, os moriríais.
src segment: Leave you, madam? With pure joy.

ref segment: No miraré como os coméis el uno al otro.
src segment: I want to watch the two of you go picnicking on one another.

ref segment: ¿Queréis que os cante?
src segment: Want me to sing to you?

ref segment: Gracias al alcaide os he vuelto a ver.
src segment: Thanks to the warden's kindness, I can see you again...

ref segment: Pero te prometo que os llevaré de vuelta a la Tierra tan pronto como pueda.
src segment: But I promise I'll get you back to Earth just as soon as I can.

ref segment: ¡Ahora recuerdo lo que os tenía que decir!
src segment: Yeah! I just remembered what it was I had to tell you!

ref segment: No os veía desde fin de curso.
src segment: Haven't seen you since the end of term.

ref segment: El os demostrará que no tenéis nada que temer.
src segment: He'll show you that you have nothing to fear.

ref segment: Pero... vi cómo os destruía...
src segment: -But... I saw him... destroy you!

ref segment: Los Dinobots os aplastaron porque no tenían estrategia, pero yo la tengo.
src segment: The Dinobots bested you because you had no strategy! But I have.

ref segment: No dejéis que eso os preocupe ahora.
src segment: Let it not concern you now.

ref segment: ¡Yo os avisó!
src segment: I warned you!

ref segment: Algo de modestia os vendría bien.
src segment: A little modesty might suit you better.

ref segment: ¿En qué os puedo ayudar?
src segment: How can I help you?

ref segment: ¿Os complació mi obra?
src segment: Did my work please you?

ref segment: Primero, acortaremos la travesía, y sé que esta decisión no os aflige.
src segment: Firstly, our journey will be shortened. Which I know is a consideration that cannot distress you.

ref segment: "Ya que os envío como ovejas entre lobos... "...sed pues prudentes como serpientes... "...y sencillos como palomas."
src segment: "Since I'm sending you like sheep amongst wolves... be as prudent as snakes and simple as doves".

ref segment: Pensad que vendrá a vuestra cámara y os hará el amor apasionadamente.
src segment: But think, he will come to your chamber and make mad, passionate love to you.

ref segment: McAngus os saluda y pone a vuestros pies el botín de guerra.
src segment: McAngus greets you and lays at your feet the spoils of war.

ref segment: Señor... la razón por la que os reunido aquí hoy es hacer un poco de justicia contra este cagarro escocés que, claramente, ha urdido estas can'tas falsas.
src segment: My Liege... the reason I have gathered you all here today is to get some proper justice meted out against this Scottish turd who has clearly forged these obviously fake letters.

ref segment: ¡Os he dicho cientos de veces, que están prohibidas las luchas en el dormitorio!
src segment: I've told you a thousand times, fighting in the dormitories is forbidden!

ref segment: - Eso es. Cuando os avise, dejáis lo que estéis haciendo, y vais corriendo a la Taberna de Jasper.
src segment: And when he comes to you, drop whatever you are doing, and speed with haste to Jasper's Tavern.

ref segment: Nadie os obligó.
src segment: Nobody forced you to...

ref segment: Creía que os había enviado Whitcomb.
src segment: I thought Whitcomb had sent you.

ref segment: El Ergon os escaneará para un posible uso posterior.
src segment: The Ergon will scan you for possible future use.

ref segment: Terminus Incorporated os controla a través del suministro de Hidromiel.
src segment: Terminus Incorporated only control you because they supply you with Hydromel.

ref segment: Entonces es natural que yo os invito a un restaurante esta noche.
src segment: Then it's only natural that I should invite you to a restaurant tonight.

ref segment: ¡Dejadme que os cuente unas noticias...!
src segment: Let me try a little news for you!

ref segment: Sabed que en el pasado era él quién os tenía en la penuria;
src segment: Know that it was he, which held you so underfortune;

ref segment: - así os caiga la eterna maldición!
src segment: - and an eternal curse fall on you!

ref segment: Sobre todo no salgáis de aquí, la muchedumbre os haría añicos.
src segment: Don't you go out. They will tear you to pieces.

ref segment: Pero el chantajista os encuentra y, o pagáis o habrá fotos... de vosotros con Crystal en todos los clubs de aquí a Nueva york... por no mencionar a vuestras esposas.
src segment: But now the blackmailer lands on you, and you either pay up or prints of you and Crystal will be sent to every ritzy club between here and New York, not to mention your wives. - Am I right so far, Hagedorn?

ref segment: Mingo, ¿qué os pasa?
src segment: Here Mingo, What's de matter wid you all?

ref segment: Pero los humanos con que os habéis encontrado todos murieron.
src segment: But the humans who met you all died.

ref segment: Vosotras, en el agua... mdisolvedlo y guardad puro el reluciente oro que os fue robado para vuestra desgracia
src segment: You in the water, wash it away and keep pure the gleaming gold that was stolen from you

ref segment: El Guardián os ha reconocido por lo que sois, extranjeros.
src segment: The Keeper recognised you for what you are, strangers.

ref segment: La Cónsul Kassia os ha traicionado a todos.
src segment: Consul Kassia has betrayed you all.

ref segment: La Cónsul Kassia os ha traicionado a todos.
src segment: Consul Kassia has betrayed you all.

ref segment: - Desde que os vi...
src segment: - I saw you and I wanted you!

ref segment: Dentro de 20, 22-23 minutos como máximo, os garantizo que llegaremos a un buen y amplio campo donde podréis hacer con toda tranquilidad vuestras necesidades.
src segment: In 22-23 minutes I ensure you that we will be in a large pitch where you will be able to do all your needs.

ref segment: Que el Hijo de Dios os ayude en la prosperidad y en la tristeza.
src segment: May the Son of God aid you in good days and difficult moments.

ref segment: ...y, a pesar de lo que hayáis visto en la tele por la noche, cuando estabais viendo lo que vuestros padres os habían prohibido, no van andando...
src segment: But, despite what you might have seen on the late show... when you were watching what your parents told you not to... they do not... walk around...

ref segment: - Sí. ¿Qué os trae por aquí?
src segment: What brings you here?

ref segment: Recordad, mis hijos, lo que os he dicho.
src segment: Now remember, my sons, what I've told you.

ref segment: Pero seguro que hay una dama en algún lugar del mundo que os interesa ¿no?
src segment: But surely there must be some lady somewhere in the world who inspires you?

ref segment: - ¿Quién os lo cuida?
src segment: - Who takes care of it for you?

ref segment: Me gusta que empecéis suaves, que os relajéis.
src segment: I like to start you out slow, ease you in.

ref segment: - Ya os lo he dicho.
src segment: - I already told you.

ref segment: El Señor, el Señor Jehová, os ha dado estos quince...
src segment: The Lord, the Lord Jehovah, has given unto you these fifteen...

ref segment: Ya os dije que aquí encontraríamos trabajo.
src segment: See? I told you there was work to be found here.

ref segment: La próxima os vais a enterar, os aviso.
src segment: - You're a load of fucking wanks. Come here again, and I'll get you next time, pal.

ref segment: ¡Buena gente, lo siento! ¡No sabía que os había hecho daño!
src segment: I am sorry good people, I didn't mean to hurt you!

ref segment: ¡Dejadme que os bese!
src segment: Let me kiss you!

ref segment: Es lo menos que puedo hacer después de los problemas que os he causado.
src segment: This is the least I can do after all the trouble I've put you two through.

ref segment: Pues IWW no os va a dejar de lado...
src segment: Well, the IWW's not gonna turn you down

ref segment: Por si os interesa la noticia, tendremos servicio nocturno de patrulla.
src segment: For those of you who are interested, we are going on an overnight recon and patrol.

ref segment: ¿ Qué os había dicho?
src segment: What'd I tell you? What'd I tell you?

ref segment: Monseñor Spellacy os da las gracias y os invita a acompañarnos a rezar el rosario con nosotros.
src segment: This is Monsignor Spellacy thanking you for your support and inviting you to be with us daily as we pray the rosary for peace.

ref segment: Asimiláis sólo lo que os afirma en la convicción de que la pasividad es virtud y necesidad.
src segment: You accept only this what reinforces you in belief that passiveness is a virtue and a must.

ref segment: Y si os pasáis con alguna de mis chicas, os daré tal patada en el culo que llegaréis hasta Angel Beach.
src segment: And if any of you get outta line with any of my girls, I'm gonna kick your candied asses all the way back to Angel Beach.

ref segment: Ahora está jugando, pero, si se harta de vosotros, os puede hacer mucho daño.
src segment: He's playin' with you now, but he's gonna get tired of you, then he's gonna hurt you bad.

ref segment: Vosotros flotaréis si os vuelvo a ver por aquí, mierdosos.
src segment: You'll float if I catch you here again, you little shit.

ref segment: Lamento interrumpir vuestra cena, pero he de comunicar noticias que puede os disgusten un poco. - ¿Turcos?
src segment: I am sorry to interrupt your dinner, but I must tell you a piece of news... that will probably upset you a little. -Turks?

ref segment: Hey chicos, ¿cuánto tiempo os tenemos que esperar?
src segment: Hey guys, how long can we wait for you?

ref segment: No os esperaba tan pronto.
src segment: I expected you later at night.

ref segment: La píldora os libera de la esclavitud de la biología.
src segment: The pill frees you from bondage to biology.

ref segment: Sed siempre dignos de la bendición de Dios que os ha unido.
src segment: Be always worthy of God's blessing, which has united you.

ref segment: Que os den por el culo a todos.
src segment: Fuck you all.

ref segment: Es que os vio con una de estas colchonetas, aunque... ¿Es eso su desayuno?
src segment: because she saw you with one of those mattresses even if...

ref segment: - Pues tenemos que hablar con quien os cuida.
src segment: - Well, we need to talk to whoever's taking care of you.

ref segment: No entiendo por qué dejáis que os explote la directiva.
src segment: I don't understand why you let the union rip you off as much as management.

ref segment: ¿Quién coño os manda?
src segment: Tell me who the fuck sent you.

ref segment: Le dire... al Maestro Dao que nunca os vuelva a molestar Si no podeis moverme
src segment: Master Dao will never trouble you again lf you can't move me

ref segment: No quiero pensar que la patronal os ha enviado para reventar la asamblea.
src segment: I don't wanna think the companies sent you in here to disrupt this meeting.

ref segment: ¿Qué os trae por aquí?
src segment: What brings you here?

ref segment: Os defraudó un poco, ¿no?
src segment: Let you down a bit, didn't he?

ref segment: Sus vendas os han asustado, ¿no?
src segment: They frightened you with bandages, huh?

ref segment: Esperáis que os lleve como un chofer, pero nadie me dice nada.
src segment: You expect me to drive you like some chauffeur. Nobody tells me anything.

ref segment: Ya os dije que tenía un plan.
src segment: See, I told you he had a plan.

ref segment: Ésta es la chica de la que os hablaba.
src segment: That's the one I was telling you about.

ref segment: Antes del comienzo de los festejos de graduación, quiero decir que espero que vuestro tiempo en Rydell... os haya preparado para los desafíos de la vida.
src segment: Before the merriment of commencement commences, I hope that your years with us here at Rydell High have prepared you for the challenges you face.

ref segment: Y Sam os ayudó.
src segment: And Sam helped you.

ref segment: Necesitáis que alguien os cuide.
src segment: Well, you do need looking after, all of you.

ref segment: No se os puede separar, aunque él esté convocado a un Concilio... y tú no.
src segment: It is impossible to separate you, even when he is summoned to a Council and you are not.

ref segment: Lo único que os pide el Patrón es que no curioseéis en los barracones.
src segment: The only thing the Master asks you is not to inquire about the barrack-camp!

ref segment: ¡Si se lo cuento al Patrón os echará de aquí al instante!
src segment: If I tell about this to the Master he'll kick you out of this place in not time!

ref segment: - ¿Quién os está esperando?
src segment: - Who's waiting for you?

ref segment: Pero eso no os exonera de la responsabilidad de estudiarlo.
src segment: But that doesn't relieve you from your responsibility for this material.

ref segment: Entonces, ¿quién os vistió así?
src segment: Who put it on you?

ref segment: Mi dulce hijo, de caballería... creía que bien os preservaba... si de ella no oíais hablar.
src segment: I tried to guard you from knighthood... so you'd never hear of it.

ref segment: - ¿Os besó?
src segment: Kissed you?

ref segment: Tal como os lo digo. Fue contra mi voluntad.
src segment: I assure you it was against my will.

ref segment: Sí, cierto... claro que os conozco bien.
src segment: But I do. I know you too well.

ref segment: Caballero, os he pedido que os desarméis.
src segment: I asked you to lay down your arms.

ref segment: Pero decidme, ¿qué os trae por aquí?
src segment: Tell me, good friend, what brings you here?

ref segment: Podréis decir que fue el valvasor... que os calzó la espuela, quien os instruyó y os lo enseñó.
src segment: Say a worthy man taught you. The one who instructed you in the use of arms.

ref segment: Os dio alegre albergue y os ofreció manjares deliciosos... pues es un hombre poderoso y rico.
src segment: He lodged you and fed you well, for he is powerful and rich.

ref segment: Creo que nunca os había visto... ni os hice nada malo.
src segment: I've never seen you, nor done you harm.

ref segment: Puesto que os he visto tan maltrecha, pobre y desnuda... mi corazón no se alegrará hasta saber la verdad.
src segment: When I saw you, so unhappy... and so bare, I knew I'd find no peace until I knew why.

ref segment: Era brutal y cruel... quien de él os quería apartar.
src segment: Only a brute would drive you from it.

ref segment: Si no os molestase, os conduciría hasta donde está el rey.
src segment: I want to take you, if you'll agree, to the King!

ref segment: Y deseaba que entre los dos hubiese amistad... si os complace y os conviene.
src segment: I am eager to have your acquaintance, should it so please you.

ref segment: Pero, hija, ¿quién os ha dicho que os querelléis ante el caballero?
src segment: Who told you, daughter, to appeal to this knight?

ref segment: Tengo una hermana muy cortés que os agasajará mucho.
src segment: I have a most courteous sister, who'll please you.

ref segment: Si habéis grabado vuestras canciones en una cinta, como os ha dicho Mike, podéis enviarlas por correo o traerlas personalmente al edificio
src segment: If you recorded your songs on a tape, as Mike told you, you can send them by mail or bring them to

ref segment: Y sé que sois buenos amigos y que te quiere mucho, pero no creo que sea bueno que os veáis ahora.
src segment: And I know you're good friends and he really loves you but I just don't think it's good that he see you right now.

ref segment: Permitidme que os presente a nuestros profesores...
src segment: May I present to you our teachers...

ref segment: Id a la cama, porque si no el gran director viene y os echa la bronca!
src segment: Go to bed everyone, otherwise the big bad headmaster... will come and shout BOO at you!

ref segment: Ya os advertí la última vez.
src segment: I warned you last time.

ref segment: Si cualquiera de mis hombres os ve, disparará.
src segment: If any of my men see you, they'll shoot.

ref segment: Él os pondrá al corriente.
src segment: He'll put you in the picture.

ref segment: Por la carne que una vez os vistió, por el espíritu que os impulsó, buscad.
src segment: By the flesh that once clothed you, by the spirit that moved you, seek.

ref segment: ¿Quién os dijo que Lord Ram no volvería otra vez?
src segment: Who told you that Lord Ram will not come back again?

ref segment: Vine a mostraros algo que os sorprenderá.
src segment: I came to show you something that will shock you.

ref segment: Las mismas últimas gotas de razón os detienen, mi amigo.
src segment: The very last drops of reason stop you, my friend.

ref segment: Yo le dije a Kelly que os cubriera.
src segment: I'm the one who told Kelly to cover for you.

ref segment: Y los demás, ¿qué os pasa?
src segment: And the rest of you, what's the matter with you?

ref segment: ¿Quién os mandó contra mi?
src segment: Who set you on my tail?

ref segment: No os dejaré
src segment: - I won't let you through!

ref segment: Soy Woody y os hablo mientras Ozark se toma un respiro.
src segment: This is Woody, talkin' to you while Ozark's catchin' his breath.

ref segment: Bueno, chicos. Os dejo para que os vayáis conociendo.
src segment: Well, I'll leave you two, fellows, to get to know each other.

ref segment: ¡Dadme el dinero u os mato!
src segment: Give me the money or I'll kill you!

ref segment: Yo os paso por 5000 francos, no hay rebajas.
src segment: I'll take you through for 5,000 francs --- no discounts.

ref segment: El viaje no os ha sentado demasiado bien.
src segment: That trip toughened you up a bit.

ref segment: Además yo nunca os traicionaré.
src segment: Besides, I'd never betray you.

ref segment: Y es con gran orgullo que yo os hablo desde este estrado como vuestro alcalde con tres ciudadanos distinguidos que os van a dirigir la palabra.
src segment: And so, it is with pride that I stand on this platform as your Mayor today with three distinguished citizens who are going to address you.

ref segment: Os recuerdo que el frente está a menos de dos millas desde aquí, lo cual significa que vosotros estáis en servicio activo y si persistís en desobedecer las órdenes, se os fusilará.
src segment: Let me remind you that the front line is less than two miles from here, which means that you're on active service and if you persist in disobeying orders, you will be shot.

ref segment: ¡Cheng os necesita! ¿Por qué no le ayudáis!
src segment: Cheng helped you so much, why don't you help him!

ref segment: ¿Dónde queréis que os lleve?
src segment: -Where do you want me to take you?

ref segment: - Ya os advertí.
src segment: - Well, I warned you.

ref segment: - Os espera mi hermano, os acompaño.
src segment: - My brother is waiting for you. I'll take you.

ref segment: No pretenderéis ostentar el supremo poder ejecutivo... porque una furcia natatoria os tirö una espada.
src segment: You can't expect to wield supreme executive power 'cause some watery tart threw a sword at you.

ref segment: Como Rey de los bretones os ordeno que os apartéis.
src segment: I command you, as King of the Britons, to stand aside.

ref segment: De modo, bravos caballeros, que si dudáis de vuestro valor, o de vuestra fuerza, no sigáis, pues la muerte os aguarda con horribles dientes enormes y afilados.
src segment: So, brave knights, if you do doubt your courage or your strength, come no further, for death awaits you all with nasty, big, pointy teeth.

ref segment: Nosotros los franceses os hemos engañado otra vez.
src segment: So, we French fellows outwit you a second time.

ref segment: En el nombre de Dios, no cesaremos en el combate... hasta que os hayamos destruido y el Santo Grial... vuelva a manos de aquellos a quienes Dios eligiö.
src segment: In the name of God, we shall not stop our fight till each one of you lies dead, and the Holy Grail returns to those whom God has chosen.

ref segment: ahora aunque está en el alma de Moisés tmorando el espíritu del Gran Dios, tan pronto como forcéis al faraón a que os libere.
src segment: Now, even there in Moses' bosom the spirit of great God dwells, that soon will force this Pharaoh to release you.

ref segment: Pero el todopoderoso os liberará.
src segment: But the Almighty One will free you and free your blood.

ref segment: Ese delito de derecho común merece las galeras...,... pero como fuisteis en un tiempo oficial del Ejército Real,... sólo os deportaré a Luisiana.
src segment: An offense that merits the galleys, but as you were once officer in the Royal Army, I shall merely deport you to Louisiana.

ref segment: Que el Rey de Inglaterra, un protestante,... le pida al Regente que os nombre Arzobispo de Cambrai...
src segment: That the King of England, a Protestant, should ask the Regent to name you Archbishop of Cambrai.

ref segment: Esta ceremonia será breve. pero os atará para la eternidad.
src segment: This ceremony may be brief but it binds you for eternity.

ref segment: ¿Cuántos más os apoyaron en la Corte... cuando abristeis el testamento del último Rey y tomasteis el poder?
src segment: How many others in court supported you when you tore up the late King's will and seized power?

ref segment: Ahora que ya no os toca más...
src segment: Now that he doesn't touch you anymore...

ref segment: ¿Vergüenza os debería dar, Monseñor¡ Llevando a una monjita por el mal camino.
src segment: Shame on you, milord! Leading a little nun astray.

ref segment: Y yo os perderé a las dos.
src segment: That way, I lose you both.

ref segment: Yo os llamo Señor... porque no se llama Monseñor... a quien os asesina.
src segment: I address you as Sir... for one doesn't say my Lord... to one's assassin.

ref segment: - Os va a dar algún mal
src segment: - Some harm will come to you.

ref segment: No, es para que os sintáis mejor.
src segment: No, it's to feel you better.

ref segment: Vosotros, mis más leales súbditos, así como Luis XIV, mi tío, os dejó para mí... así yo os dejaré, más numerosos todavía, a Luis XV y sus sucesores.
src segment: You, my most loyal subjects, as Louis XIV, my uncle, left you to me, I shall leave you, more numerous still, to Louis XV and his successor.

ref segment: Él os enseñará a perder las llaves.
src segment: He'll teach you to lose wrenches.

ref segment: ¡Esperad a que os coja!
src segment: Wait till I get you!

ref segment: Por tanto, os agradeceré que me paguéis lo que me debéis.
src segment: And so, I'll thank you to pay me the sum you owe me.

ref segment: Permitid que os presente a mi hijo...
src segment: May I introduce you to my son...

ref segment: Señor... es preciso que os haga una confesión.
src segment: Sir I have a confession to make to you.

ref segment: Caballeros, es preciso que os deje unos momentos.
src segment: Gentlemen, I'm going to leave you for a few minutes.

ref segment: Y ya que no puedo castigar personalmente a este villano rufián, y como no soporto... ser testigo del trato que os da... y detesto su horrible presencia como si fuera la peste... he decidido abandonar mi hogar y no volver nunca.
src segment: And as I cannot personally chastise this low-bred ruffian, and cannot bear to witness his treatment of you and loathe his company as if it were the plague I have decided to leave my home and never return.

ref segment: Siento molestaros con esto, señor Lyndon... pero temo que Bryan os ha desobedecido... y se ha escapado a la granja de Doolan.
src segment: I'm sorry to trouble you, Mr. Lyndon but I believe Master Bryan has disobeyed you and stolen away to Doolan's farm.

ref segment: Sí, os estábamos esperando.
src segment: Yes, we were expecting you.

ref segment: ¿Cómo os va la vida, Graham?
src segment: How's the world treating you, Graham?

ref segment: Lord Bullingdon también me ha encargado que os comunique... que si decidís permanecer aquí... vuestra estancia significaría infaliblemente... la cárcel.
src segment: Lord Bullingdon has also asked me to point out to you that should you decide to remain here your stay would infallibly plunge you into jail.

ref segment: Hoy, el desierto os ha asado vivos.
src segment: Today, the desert broiled you raw.

ref segment: Dice que os conoció en Turquía.
src segment: But he says he met you in Turkey.

ref segment: ¿Os he tratado mal?
src segment: Did I treat you badly?

ref segment: ¿Qué os pasa?
src segment: What's the matter with you?

ref segment: Que Dios os bendiga y os cuide hasta que nos reunamos en el más allá.
src segment: God... God bless you and watch over you till we are joined in the hereafter.

ref segment: Si no me tomarais el pelo con que Aristóteles Bolt os persigue, podriamos seguir juntos más tiempo del previsto.
src segment: If you weren't joshing me about Aristotle bolt being after you, we might be together longer than we planned.

ref segment: - El que puso el mapa en la cajita Lo hizo muy bien. Os ha llevado muchos años encontrarlo.
src segment: - Whoever put the map in the case hid it so well, it took you all these years to find it.

ref segment: Si no os importa me gustaria poder recordaros...
src segment: I'd like to plan on remembering you two... as if you were my kids.

ref segment: Qué, chicos, ¿os suena de algo Buisson?
src segment: Say, guys. The name Buisson mean anything to you?

ref segment: Georges os acompañará.
src segment: Good. Georges will drive you.

ref segment: No, estaré más tranquilo si Georges os acompaña.
src segment: No, it will ease my mind to have Georges driving you.

ref segment: Por supuesto, os encontrará.
src segment: Of course he'll find you.

ref segment: Sólo eso: él os encontrará.
src segment: Just this: he'll find you.

ref segment: Cada vez que os veía creía que no podría aguantarlo más
src segment: Each time I watched you, I thought I couldn't take it.

ref segment: ¡Os pago para trabajar!
src segment: I'm paying you to work!

ref segment: Ya no os necesito.
src segment: Some of you are no longer needed.

ref segment: ¿Qué os trae por aquí?
src segment: What brings you here?

ref segment: ¡bajo del cielo, y os fulmino!
src segment: I'll come down from the heavens, I'll strike you down.

ref segment: Si no os portáis con más elegancia y hacéis menos ruido, como corresponde, ...la señora Appleyard no os permitirá ir a Hanging Rock.
src segment: Unless you all deport yourselves with rather more grace and considerably less noise, Mrs. Appleyard will see to it that none of you go to Hanging Rock today.

ref segment: Esperad a que os coja. Os voy a...
src segment: Wait'll I get a hold of you.

ref segment: Esperad a que os coja.
src segment: Wait'll I get a hold of you.

ref segment: ¿Quién os ha enseñado a huir de la ira que está por llegar?
src segment: Who hath shewed you to flee from the wrath to come?

ref segment: Un día se os dará porque con la medida con que habréis medido seréis medidos también.
src segment: For with the same measure that you shall mete withal, it shall be measured to you again.

ref segment: Pero yo os digo que no juréis para nada, decid "sí" cuando sea "sí" y "no" cuando sea "no".
src segment: But I say to you not to swear at all, But let your speech be.. ..yea, yea: no, no.

ref segment: Yo os digo que cualquiera que mira a una mujer con deseo impuro ya ha cometido adulterio con ella en su corazón.
src segment: But I say to you, that whosoever shall look on a woman to lust after her, hath already committed adultery with her in his heart.

ref segment: Pero yo os digo que cualquiera que echa a su esposa, excepto en caso especial, la expone él mismo al adulterio.
src segment: But I say to you, that whosoever shall put away his wife, excepting the cause,

ref segment: Pero yo os digo, amad a vuestros enemigos, haced el bien a quienes os odian, bendecid a quienes os maldicen, orad por quienes os calumnian.
src segment: But I say to you, Love your enemies: do good to them that hate you: Bless them that curse you and pray for them that calumniate you.

ref segment: Así han perseguido a los profetas que os han precedido.
src segment: For so they persecuted the prophets that were before you.

ref segment: Y si os dicen algo, decid que Jesús los necesita y que los devolverá.
src segment: And if any man shall say anything to you, say ye that Jesus hath need of them. And forthwith he will let them go.

ref segment: Lo que os mando es que os améis unos a otros.
src segment: I command you that you love one another.

ref segment: Si el mundo os odia, sabed que me ha odiado a mí antes.
src segment: If the world hate you, know ye that it hath hated me before you.

ref segment: Si fuerais del mundo, el mundo amaría lo que es suyo, pero vosotros no lo sois, os he separado de él por amor, por eso el mundo os odia.
src segment: If you had been of the world, the world would love its own. You are not of the world, but I have chosen you because of love. Therefore the world hateth you.

ref segment: Cuando os mandé sin bolsas, alforjas, ni calzado, ¿os faltó algo?
src segment: When I sent you without purse and scrip and shoes, did you want anything?

ref segment: Pero si no colaboráis, entonces es seguro que Davros os usará... como experimento con su máquina en unas horas.
src segment: But if you don't cooperate, then it is certain that Davros will use you as an experiment with his machine in a few hours' time.

ref segment: ¡Yo os he diseñado!
src segment: I created you!

ref segment: Kellman os llevó a una trampa.
src segment: Kellman led you into a trap.

ref segment: El Comandante Noé os interrogará al volver.
src segment: Commander Noah will question you on his return.

ref segment: La próxima vez, terrestre, os destruiremos totalmente.
src segment: Next time, Earthling, we shall utterly destroy you.

ref segment: No se va a estirar más lejos y, de hecho, en breve, os va a estirar hacia atrás.
src segment: -It won't stretch any further. In fact, very soon it will start to pull you back.

ref segment: Os esperaba desde hace días.
src segment: I've been awaiting you for several days.

ref segment: Venid, os acompañaré a vuestra habitación.
src segment: Come, I'll accompany you to your room.

ref segment: No sé que os depare el destino Señor Descartes, pero os recomendaría, pedirle a Dios, le conservara en la humildad, porque la sabiduría conduce a perderse entre la ciencia, la verdad absoluta, meramente de Dios, permanece en misterio para los hombres.
src segment: I do not know what destiny awaits you Mr Descartes, but I highly recommend you to pray to God to keep you humble, because wisdom gets lost through science, the absolute truth, namely God, remains a mystery for all men.

ref segment: Así que os perderé una vez más.
src segment: So I'll lose you once again.

ref segment: El Dr. Gerolamus estará aquí en un minuto con la carta que os pedí entregar al Señor Reigne en Dventer.
src segment: Dr Gerolamus will be here in a minute with the letter I asked you to deliver to Mr Reigne at Dventer.

ref segment: Esos tres caballeros os están esperando, son franceses.
src segment: Those three gentlemen are waiting for you, they're French.

ref segment: Yo nunca os voy a abandonar.
src segment: I'll never abandon you.

ref segment: Disculpad, pero realmente no puedo entender que con vuestro conocimiento de la fisiología humana, él no os haya convencido de las pruebas de su doctrina.
src segment: Excuse me, but I really can't understand that with your knowledge of human physiology, he has not convinced you of the evidence of his doctrine.

ref segment: Pero vos os quemaís con inquietud y vos teneís un afán de conocimiento, que os llevará a abrazar obras de distinto tipo.
src segment: But you burn with restlessness and you have a greed for knowledge, that will lead you to embrace different works together.

ref segment: Extranjeros, dad el nombre de aquellos que os enviaron y les perdonaremos la vida.
src segment: Alien, name those who sent you and your life may be spared.

ref segment: Era quien os estaba separando... destruyendo tu hogar.
src segment: that was breaking you two up, breaking up your home.

ref segment: Que Dios os bendiga a todos.
src segment: God bless you, alles.

ref segment: Esta es la última vez que os veo.
src segment: I shall no longer see you.

ref segment: Os he dicho que trabajaré en otro sitio.
src segment: I told you I'll work somewhere else.

ref segment: Pero no sabemos que os ha pasado.
src segment: But what happened to you, we don't know.

ref segment: No os reconocerá, Doctor.
src segment: She will not acknowledge you, Doctor.

ref segment: A ver... ¿qué os sugiere esta imagen? .
src segment: What does this design suggest to you?

ref segment: Quiero que cuando yo os señale bajéis lentamente las manos... y con mucho cuidado os quitéis los pantalones, y los dejéis junto a... vuestros pies, y luego volved a subir las manos a vuestras cabezas.
src segment: When I point this thing at you, you pull down your pants, Throw them over there on that heap, But not before I tell you to.

ref segment: ¡O si no os comerá el hombre del saco!
src segment: Or the bogeyman will get you!

ref segment: ¿Qué os pasa?
src segment: What's really happening with you two?

ref segment: Siempre os pasa lo mismo, siempre la misma historia.
src segment: I know from at home, with women like you, it's always the same story.

ref segment: Pero se supone que os los tienen que decir, ¿no?
src segment: But it is supposed to be declared to you, isnt it.

ref segment: Eso es lo que os estoy diciendo, y ahora la verdad está ahí afuera.
src segment: This I've been telling you, and now the truth is coming out.

ref segment: Y cuando salgáis fuera, para cualquier reportero que os pregunte acerca de Uganda, creo que estaréis bien equipados con toda esa información.
src segment: And when you go there, any reporters wants to ask you about Uganda, I think you are well-equipped with all informations.

ref segment: Espero que os guste la tarta.
src segment: I want all of you to enjoy your cake.

ref segment: Por eso os quiero en esta misión.
src segment: That's why I want you on this drive.

ref segment: Haré que os quedéis solos. Os encerraré en el cuarto de baño, os dejaré en un barco o algo por el estilo.
src segment: I'll sort of fling you together, lock you up in the linen closet or push you out to sea in a boat, all that sort of thing.

ref segment: Os quitaremos a los dos toda vuestra felicidad, tristeza toda vuestra ira y vuestra alegría y la única emoción que os dejaremos será el miedo.
src segment: We 'll take from the two of you all your happiness and sadness, all your anger and joy, leaving you immersed in nothing but fear.

ref segment: ¡Es la última vez! ¡Ya os dije no hacer esto!
src segment: Cut it out, I told you not to do that!

ref segment: Éstos, orgulloso pueblo de Sicilia, son los versos que desde el exilio el gran poeta Gabriele D'Annunzio os envía.
src segment: These, proud people of Sicily. are the verses from exile the great poet Gabriele D'Annunzio sends you.

ref segment: Y arrancándoos de su seno, os envía a la lucha, ... diciendo: "Ve, hijo. No puedes renunciar a vencer, ni tampoco a morir".
src segment: And the plucking of your breasts, sends you into the fight, ... saying, "Go, son You can't be overcome, resign, or die. "

ref segment: Que por primera vez os ha visto como lo que sois.
src segment: Because then for the first time he saw you all clearly.

ref segment: Hasta que, como Moisés, os devuelva la tierra prometida que crearon nuestros antepasados.
src segment: Until, like Moses, I've returned to you the promised land of liberty our forefathers created.

ref segment: Oí cómo el Señor Kmicic os ordenó que estuviérais en calma en Lyubich.
src segment: I heard myself how Sir Kmicic commanded you to stay quietly in Lyubich.

ref segment: Ella todavía os ama.
src segment: She still loves you.

ref segment: ¡Ví cómo os miraba cuando os metieron dentro después del duelo!
src segment: I saw how she looked at you when you were brought in after the duel!

ref segment: Ella os ama.
src segment: She loves you.

ref segment: Dije que os ama.
src segment: I said she loves you.

ref segment: No dije que os quiera.
src segment: I didn't say she wants you.

ref segment: En la que se os ordena reclutar gente, y formar un escuadrón.
src segment: Which orders you to recruit men, and form a squadron.

ref segment: Si servís a vuestro país, los nobles os perdonarán.
src segment: If you serve your country, the nobles will forgive you.

ref segment: El Hetmán os pide que entréis, caballeros.
src segment: The Hetman asks you to enter, gentlemen.

ref segment: Permitidme, Alteza, que os sirva no por obligación sino de corazón, o también me volveré loco.
src segment: Permit me, your Highness, to serve you not from constraint but from my heart, or else I'll go mad.

ref segment: Decidme de nuevo, gracioso caballero ¿Os dijo Radziwill que nos había perdonado?
src segment: Tell me once again, gracious cavalier did Radziwill promise you that he'd spare us?

ref segment: Nos os guardaré rencor.
src segment: I do not harbor ill will against you.

ref segment: ¿Y Radziwill os dejó en libertad?
src segment: And Radziwill set you free?

ref segment: Él os unirá, como un forro a su traje pero como no es muy experto, ni forma parte del gremio será fácil desgarrarlo más tarde.
src segment: He will sow you together like a suit with its lining but since he's not much of an expert, nor part of the guild it will be easy to tear it apart later.

ref segment: Si quisiera, os podría aniquilar facilmente.
src segment: If I want to, I can annihilate you with ease.

ref segment: Os han puesto precio.
src segment: There's a bounty on you.

ref segment: Las chicas de la ciudad relincharán en cuanto os vean.
src segment: The ladies in this town are going to whinny, prance and kick just at the sight of you three.

ref segment: Cuando os conocí, erais unos muchachos callados.
src segment: You know, when I first met you boys, you were a sober bunch.

ref segment: El Presidente os observa.
src segment: The president is watching you,

ref segment: Vuestro amigo, el coronel Custer, os dará a conocer... las órdenes del Presidente Nixon.
src segment: Your friend, Colonel Custer, is going to tell you about the orders given by our beloved President Nixon,

ref segment: ¡Os prohibo tocar mi coche!
src segment: I forbid you to touch my DS!

ref segment: Siempre tenemos curiosidad por saber lo que os empujo a venir aqui a Les Lipstick.
src segment: We are always curious as to what drew you here... to Les Lipstick.

ref segment: Desde el instante que os conocí mi vida a sido como una fiesta
src segment: Ever since I met you... my life's been like a vacation!

ref segment: Ella no os quiere en absoluto.
src segment: She does not love you at all.

ref segment: Pero si le tocáis un pelo a D'Artagnan, os juro que os mataré con mis propias manos.
src segment: But if you touch him a hair of D'Artagnan, I swear I will kill you with my own hands.

ref segment: Ella tambien os ha condenado a muerte, a ti y a Madame Bonacieux.
src segment: She also has condemned you to death, to you and Madame Bonacieux.

ref segment: Una vez allí, quizá consigáis utilizar vuestra belleza para que alguien os traiga a casa.
src segment: Once there, perhaps you succeed Use your beauty for someone to bring you home.

ref segment: ¿Qué os separa de los demás?
src segment: What separates you from the others?

ref segment: Las personas que os engañaron están ahí fuera.
src segment: The people who tricked you are out there.

ref segment: Yo soy Lindoro que fielmente os adora que os desea por esposa, que por vuestro nombre os llama
src segment: I am Lindoro who truly adores you who wishes to wed you, who calls you by name

ref segment: - Necesito saberlo - ¿Él también os hace enfadar?
src segment: - l wish to know - He upsets you too?

ref segment: ¡Que os lleve el diablo!
src segment: May the devil take you!

ref segment: Con fiebre, Don Basilio, ¿quién os manda salir a la calle?
src segment: Who advised you, Don Basilio, to go out walking with a fever?

ref segment: Hermanos, gracias a todos, que dios os bendiga
src segment: Brothers, I thank you all a lot. God bless you.

ref segment: Creo que la jefa os está llamando.
src segment: I think the Chief is calling all of you.

ref segment: ¡Os lo tengo dicho!
src segment: I've told you before.

ref segment: O sea, ¿qué os trae por aquí esta vez?
src segment: I mean, what brings you to Fun City at this time?

ref segment: Haced lo que os digo o os pego un tiro entre ceja y ceja.
src segment: I must ask you to do exactly as I say Or I shall be forced to shoot you right between the eyes!

ref segment: Id al magistrado, y os meterá entre rejas.
src segment: Go to the magistrate, and he'll throw you behind bars.

ref segment: La embajada Draconiana os engañó al mover a los prisioneros,... montando un ataque armado con el fin de rescatar a sus agentes.
src segment: The Draconian embassy tricked you into moving the prisoners, then mounted an armed attack in order to rescue their agents.

ref segment: He traído a algunos viejos amigos para que os veáis.
src segment: I've brought some old friends along to meet you.

ref segment: ¿Por qué os invadieron los Daleks?
src segment: Why did the Daleks invade you?

ref segment: Vuestra única esperanza es que convenza a quien os trajo aquí de que os envíe a casa.
src segment: I have to persuade whoever brought you here to send you home.

ref segment: - Yo soy el que os trajo aquí!
src segment: - I am the one who brought you here!

ref segment: Os ha traído aquí e impregnado con sus propiedades,... de modo que podrían existir en ambos mundos.
src segment: It brought you here and imbued you with its properties so that you could exist in both worlds.

ref segment: ¿Por qué creéis que el Gran Consejo os quería a los dos aquí?
src segment: Why else do you think the High Council wanted the two of you here?

ref segment: He creado los organismos que os trajeron aquí.
src segment: I created the organisms which brought you here.

ref segment: ¿Crees que este truco os salvará mucho tiempo?
src segment: Do you think this trickery will save you for long?

ref segment: Quiero decir, si os sirve de consuelo, me estáis sacando de mis casillas.
src segment: I mean, if it's any consolation to you, you're scaring me out of my wits.

ref segment: Que Dios os ayude en la batalla y os conceda la victoria
src segment: May God assist you in battle and bring you victory

ref segment: ¿Alguien os invitó a un trago?
src segment: Has someone treated you to a drink?

ref segment: El destino os ha unido.
src segment: Fate has joined you.

ref segment: Sí, bueno, os dejo a todos juntos.
src segment: Yes, well, I'll leave you all together.

ref segment: Haré que uno de mis muchachos os lleve hasta en el muelle.
src segment: I'll get one of my chaps to run you down to the quayside.

ref segment: Los vecinos os ayudarán si organizáis el terror contrarrevolucionario.
src segment: And your neighbors will be right with you As you organize counterrevolutionary terror.

ref segment: Tenme al corriente de como os van las cosas.
src segment: Let me know how things are going for both of you.

ref segment: ¡Tened cuidado de que el Cielo no os derribe por vuestros pecados!
src segment: Take heed lest Heaven strike you down for your sins!

ref segment: El Intendente os va a hablar.
src segment: Yes... the bailiff wants to speak to you.

ref segment: cuándo dejes el molino, camino del colegio, donde la puerta de piedra... he dejado una torta hecha con la harina que mi padre os ha robado.
src segment: when you leave the mill,just behind the door, you'll find a loaf madewith your stolen flour. Go, and God protect you, my love.

ref segment: Dejadme marchar y que Dios os acompañe en vuestro camino... que yo debo continuar el mío.
src segment: Let me go,and God be with you on your way. I must follow my own.

ref segment: Quizá sea mejor que os deje solos.
src segment: Maybe I should leave you alone. Who do you mean?

ref segment: Y después de lo que hemos hecho... seguro que os la he dejado demasiado agotada.
src segment: After that, I expect she's too tuckered out for you boys.

ref segment: Dejad que os oiga.
src segment: Let me hear you.

ref segment: Y con gente que os conoce.
src segment: Good jobs with people who know you.

ref segment: ÉI os trajo hasta aquí,? No?
src segment: He's the one that brought you here, isn't he?

ref segment: Seguid fornicando, os seguiré asolando.
src segment: You keep up that fornicating, I'll take you to ruination.

ref segment: No espero llegar a Belle Fourche con una sola res pero estoy acorralado así que os contrato.
src segment: I don't expect to get to Belle Fourche with one single head of beef but I'm cornered so I'm takin' you on.

ref segment: Recordad lo que os he dicho.
src segment: Remember what I told you.

ref segment: Y os devolveré a vuestras casitas de barrio residencial... a tiempo para ver el partido del domingo por la tarde.
src segment: I'm gonna have you back in your little suburban house in time to see the football game on Sunday afternoon.

ref segment: ¿Quién os hizo esto?
src segment: Who did this to you?

ref segment: ¿Queréis que os lisonjee? Ni hablar.
src segment: You want me to suck up to you?

ref segment: Wu Sung, Su Excelencia os ha tratado con honores, ¿por qué delinquís en su casa?
src segment: Wu Sung, His Excellency has been treating you so well How come you turned into a thief?

ref segment: Su Excelencia os recompensará una vez hayáis cumplido vuestra tarea.
src segment: His Excellency will reward you afterward

ref segment: Habitualmente, os llevaría a mi juzgado y os juzgaría y os colgaría.
src segment: Ordinarily, I'd take you in my court and try you and hang you.

ref segment: Si os coge en campo abierto, os despellejará vivas.
src segment: If he catches you out in the open, he'll just butcher you.

ref segment: Y hará que os cojan y os cuelguen a todos.
src segment: And he'll come trackin' you down and hang every one of you.

ref segment: Eso es por lo que os he elegido.
src segment: That's why I chose you.

ref segment: Hay una mujer en el hotel que os está esperando, no sabe nada pero os conducirá por la ciudad.
src segment: There's a woman waiting for you, she knows nothing, but she'll take you round the city.

ref segment: Os he elegido porque él combatió en Italia...
src segment: I chose you because he fought in Italy...

ref segment: Hace quince días que os busco.
src segment: I've been looking for you these last two weeks.

ref segment: Cuando alguien os deja es como si muriera.
src segment: When someone leaves you it's like they die.

ref segment: ¿Y para eso os hemos elegido?
src segment: What did we elect you for?

ref segment: ya os dije que no le dierais callos, que luego siempre le da fiebre.
src segment: I told you not to let him eat any tripe. He's had a fever since then.

ref segment: ¡Princesa, el Tetrarca os ruega volver al festín!
src segment: Princess, the Tetrarch prays you to return to the feast!

ref segment: El Tetrarca os ha prohibido hablarle.
src segment: The Tetrarch has forbidden you to speak with him.

ref segment: ..el Tetrarca os ruega volver a...
src segment: ..the Tetrarch prays you to return to...

ref segment: ¡Malditos borrachos, acercaos, para que os convierta en abstemios!
src segment: Alright you drunk fellows, you come after me. I teetotal you pretty damn quick.

ref segment: Nos os peguéis, que os parto la cara!
src segment: Stop hitting each other or I'll come over and slug you!

ref segment: ¿Os delató por eso?
src segment: He turned you in for that?

ref segment: ¿Y qué pasará con aquellos que os sucedan?
src segment: And what will happen to those who come after you?

ref segment: Que el Señor os acompañe.
src segment: And may the Lord accompany you!

ref segment: El rostro de Aggedor se os fue revelado?
src segment: Was the face of Aggedor revealed to you?

ref segment: Porque os digo que, si Kronos llegó de nuevo, la Atlántida sería condenado, destruido, para no levantarse de nuevo!
src segment: For I tell you, if Kronos came again, Atlantis would be doomed, destroyed, never to rise again!

ref segment: Se le ha visto en nuestra zona temporal... con los delincuentes que os atacaron.
src segment: He has been seen in our time zone... with the criminals who attacked you.

ref segment: Pero él os trató como a hijos.
src segment: But the King treated you like children.

ref segment: "perdóname el mal que os he hecho.
src segment: "Mom, forgive me for the troubles I caused you!"

ref segment: Yo os amo, Señor, más tiernamente que a la luz, al espacio y a la libertad, muchísimo... más que todas las riquezas del mundo.
src segment: Sir, I love you more than word can wield the matter; dearer than eyesight, space or liberty;

ref segment: Señor, habéis dado pruebas de vuestra valentía, y la fortuna os ha guiado a la victoria.
src segment: Sir, you have showed to-day your valiant strain, and fortune led you well.

ref segment: No os he detenido.
src segment: I ain't arresting you.

ref segment: Fue él, en el pasado, quien os tuvo en baja fortuna aunque creíais que éramos nososotros.
src segment: Know that it was he in times past which held you so under fortune, which you thought had been our innocent self.

ref segment: ¿Estáis tan evangelizados como para rezar por ese buen hombre cuya mano os ha llevado a la tumba y a los vuestros a la ruina?

src segment: It is a way of recording transactions, recording value, and it does it digitally, so you and I can send it to each other directly, and everything is recorded in the open ledger.

ref segment: Mediante la supervisión y actualización del libro mayor que, en un sistema colectivo, basado en el consenso, usted elimina la necesidad para alguien en el medio tiene que ser ese tipo de depósito de toda la información.

src segment: Where would I be now if I'd split when you did?

ref segment: Vosotros no lo entendéis.

ref segment: Vosotros me pegabais en la escuela.

ref segment: Por lo tanto, vosotros deberíais ser los líderes.

ref segment: Vosotros os habéis buscado esto.

ref segment: Vosotros sois todo lo que queda de la población indígena.
src segment: You are all that is left of the indigenous population.

ref segment: Vosotros id delante.

src segment: You all have gone through hardships and have lost your families.

ref segment: pero él no era como vosotros esperabais.
src segment: You wanted a child, so you adopted one, but he wasn't what you expected.

ref segment: pero vosotros habéis vivido con él...
src segment: That's not what I meant. But you've lived with him...

ref segment: No seré el tipo más listo del mundo, incluso cuando no tengo resaca... pero sí que recuerdo un proceso en el cual me preguntáis... y yo respondo, y yo pregunto y vosotros respondéis... y ése es el modo por el que averiguamos cosas.
src segment: Well, I may not be the swiftest guy in the world even when I'm not hungover but I do seem to remember a process where you ask me questions and I give answers, and I ask questions and you give answers and that's the way we find out things.

ref segment: Soy un estudiante, no un soldado, como vosotros.
src segment: I'm not a soldier, I'm a schoolboy and so are you.

ref segment: ¡Los cerdos tienen más sentido de la limpieza que vosotros! ¡Limpiad las cubiertas, u os haré sacarles brillo con la lengua si no corregís vuestra conducta/
src segment: Now you'll get these decks clean or by God I'll make you lick them clean with your tongues if you don't mend your ways.

ref segment: Pero me pregunto si vosotros lo daréis.
src segment: Will you make the best of it? Do you hear me?

ref segment: Yo soy un oficial de la marina de Estados Unidos, y a menos que haya entendido mal, o que lo retire vosotros me habéis insinuado, en su nombre, para cometer traición por dinero.
src segment: I am an officer of the United States Navy, and unless I misunderstood you, or you withdraw it you have asked me, in his name, to commit treason for money.

ref segment: Llevo años esperándolo, pero vosotros sois unos malos.
src segment: I waited for him years on end.. but you're so mean and miscreant.

src segment: You have a few drinks, I'm going to gamble.

ref segment: Vosotros no.
src segment: You two don't.

ref segment: "Si no aprendeis ésto, será peor para vosotros.

ref segment: Silencio... Estoy harto de vosotros.

ref segment: Vosotros no sabéis nada.
src segment: Pretend you don't know anything.

ref segment: Vosotros no lo entendéis.

ref segment: Y mientras vosotros no conspiréis contra mí,... se mantendrá así.

ref segment: Vosotros, los Efímeros, sois diferentes.
src segment: You Ephemerals are different.

ref segment: - Pero si lo producís vosotros...
src segment: -But if you produced you own...

src segment: But you give a boon without asking for

ref segment: ¡Y se le para cuando vosotros paráis!

src segment: which you thought had been our innocent self: this I made good to you in our last conference, pass'd in probation with you how you were borne in hand, how cross'd, the instruments, who wrought with them, and all things else that might

ref segment: ¡Voy a contar hasta tres, rendíos y deponed las armas, sino la barbarie caerá sobre vosotros!
src segment: I'll count three. If you don't surrender then, I'm not to blame. I'll ruin your houses.

ref segment: ¡No tan bien como vosotros!

src segment: And I'm not answering any more questions until you tell me exactly who you are.

src segment: Because I was remembering the arena of Vicenza. Are you never wrong?

src segment: I wanted to tell you that we won. That we got what we wanted in '68 and what you wanted in '70.

ref segment: Vosotros sois artistas, pintores, poetas, literatos...
src segment: - You are painters, literate...

ref segment: Y vosotros, masa de pecadores cobardes siempre a punto a arrodillaos, a inclinar la cabeza delante del poder... Ahora deberíais arrodillaros e inclinar la cabeza delante de uno que su cabeza no la ha inclinado nunca sino delante de eso de aquí.
src segment: And you, bunch of cowardly sheep, always ready to kneel in front of the powerful, now kneel in front of someone who'll never bow, but in front of this thing.

ref segment: Vosotros experimentaréis algunos olores que pueden causaros un colapso. Pero los productores de este film creen que el público de hoy es lo suficientemente maduro para aceptar el hecho de que algunas cosas en la vida Simple y llanamente apestan.
src segment: You will experience some odors that may shock you... but the producers of this film... believe that today's audiences are mature enough... to accept the fact that some things in life... just plain stink.

ref segment: Dejadme a mi, vosotros no salgais.

ref segment: Esta noche cuesta estar con vosotros.

ref segment: - Debió de pasar algo entre vosotros.

ref segment: Pero véis iguales que vosotros.

src segment: And you, remember to be cautious while going around, and to always be on the alert, because nowadays people have odd ideas in mind.

src segment: Now listen, I'll do some more work on George, you get him to the coronation room, get him crowned, and while he's ruling the country, you two can find the real prince.

ref segment: - ¿No tenéis hermanas vosotros?

ref segment: -No, vosotros sois los héroes.

ref segment: ¡¿Pero se puede seguir arrullando como haceís vosotros?

ref segment: porque vosotros. no habeís escuchado el sonido que ha hecho dentro de mi oreja.

ref segment: Y ya está. vosotros deciís que es droga...

src segment: Why don't you gamble someplace else?

src segment: I expect you to be never, never satisfied with yourselves.

src segment: "You can make my life a fantasy, as I have tried, but failed to make it."

ref segment: Afortunados vosotros.

src segment: Jesus: Doubtless you will say to me this similitude:

ref segment: Si vosotros entendierais qué significa
src segment: And if you knew what this meaneth:

ref segment: - ¿Vosotros también queréis iros?

src segment: You call me Master and Lord. If then I being your Lord and Master, have washed your feet; you also ought to wash.. ..one another's feet.

src segment: If you had been of the world, the world would love its own. You are not of the world, but I have chosen you because of love. Therefore the world hateth you.

src segment: For 1,000 years, the Wirrn fought them, but you humans destroyed the breeding colonies.

ref segment: Pero tú eres el vigía.

ref segment: ¿Quién eres tú?

ref segment: Yo lo sé, tú lo vas a averiguar.

ref segment: - Si tú lo dices.

ref segment: Si tú lo dices.

ref segment: Tú lo viste a él.

ref segment: ¡No, tú puedes!
